title: JaxNodeNext
description: A command line tool for checking on the next jaxnode meeting. This tool can be used to find the next jaxnode meeting. Simply type 'jnn' into your console to find out when and where the next JaxNode meeting will take place.

title: JaxNode iPhone
description: An iOS application for the JaxNode user group
howtoinstall: Go to the link above to the iTunes App Store

title: JaxNode Android
description: An Android application for the JaxNode user group
howtoinstall: Go to the link above to the Google Play store
